author: Emma Reynolds, CNN
title: Why people across the West are ignoring advice to stay home
description: In these times of extraordinary global turmoil, the weekend came as a welcome break for many. But anyone looking at the cyclists and runners crowding New York's parks, hikers thronging Britain's beauty spots and groups hanging out at California's busy beaches…
